name: Helidefence
description:
You are a military helicopter pilot who must protect the border from enemy invaders. On your way there will be a lot of military equipment that you want to destroy. Defeat everyone to become a hero. Pick up armor to protect the helicopter.

Classic timekiller, control the arrows on the keyboard, firing rockets with a mouse.

Simple graphics, endless level. Hold on for more time and score a large number of points.
